name: refined-prun
description: Browser extension that simplifies the Prosperous Universe interface and adds useful features

scripts.build: pnpm run build:all && npx tsx scripts/package.ts
scripts.build:local: cross-env TARGET_PLATFORM=local vite build && npx tsx scripts/manifest-generator.ts local
scripts.build:chrome: pnpm run clean && cross-env TARGET_PLATFORM=chrome pnpm run compile && cross-env TARGET_PLATFORM=chrome vite build && npx tsx scripts/manifest-generator.ts chrome
scripts.build:firefox: pnpm run clean && cross-env TARGET_PLATFORM=firefox pnpm run compile && cross-env TARGET_PLATFORM=firefox vite build && npx tsx scripts/manifest-generator.ts firefox
scripts.build:edge: pnpm run clean && cross-env TARGET_PLATFORM=edge pnpm run compile && cross-env TARGET_PLATFORM=edge vite build && npx tsx scripts/manifest-generator.ts edge
scripts.build:tm: pnpm run clean && cross-env TARGET_PLATFORM=tm pnpm run compile && vite build
scripts.build:all: pnpm run clean && npx tsx scripts/build-all.ts
scripts.package:all: pnpm run build:all && npx tsx scripts/package.ts
